text: Cancellaria obesa, common name : the obese nutmeg, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Cancellariidae, the nutmeg snails. ==Description== The size of an adult shell varies between 24 mm and 57 mm. ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the Pacific Ocean along Baja California, Mexico, Ecuador and Galapagos. ==References== * Hemmen J. (2007). Recent Cancellariidae. Wiesbaden, 428pp ==External links== * Category:Cancellariidae Category:Gastropods described in 1832
title: Cancellaria obesa
